alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 4:01PM CDT until June 01 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GRANT AND NORTH CENTRAL GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hunter, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pond Creek, Lamont, Hunter, and Jefferson. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
